member.name: T:DoubleToString.DoubleExtension
member.summary: class that proves extension method for double type that converts 8 bytes of double value into string.

member.name: M:DoubleToString.DoubleExtension.ConvertToString(System.Double)
member.summary: Double Extension method that converts 8 bytes of double type into a string.
member.returns: string that contains bits of the double value.
